desc: 30% boost to Atk, max HP, hugely boosts BB Atk, considerably boosts BB Atk when HP is over 50%, damage taken may restore HP & activates at turn's end effects during turn's start instead

dictionary.lore: A blade entrusted to the first captain of the Randall Guard by his heroic father. Legends hold that this superior weapon was used during humanity's initial flight from Grand Gaia, and that it is now kept under heavy security by the Imperial Guard. The will of past wielders to protect the people has been infused into this blade, granting it power worthy of its title as a sacred item. This blade holds the power to turn the tide of any situation.

name: Holy Lineage Blade
